title: Performance or acceptance under reservation of
context: ยง490:1-308 Performance or acceptance under reservation of rights. (a) A party that with explicit reservation of rights performs or promises performance or assents to performance in a manner demanded or offered by the other party does not thereby prejudice the rights reserved. Such words as &ldquo;without prejudice&rdquo;, &ldquo;under protest&rdquo;, or the like are sufficient. (b) Subsection (a) does not apply to an accord and satisfaction. [L 2004, c 162, pt of ยง1]
